question: Who has been appointed as the new Russia's new ambassador to India?
explanation: Russian President Vladimir Putin has recently appointed career diplomat Nikolay Kudashev as Russia\'s new ambassador to India. The appointment of Kudashev comes nearly seven months after the death of Russia\'s previous ambassador to India Alexander Kadakin. Kudashev, a specialist in South East Asia, is currently the Deputy Director General Secretariat of the Ministry of foreign Affairs of Russia.
